summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5285 for the improvement of The Alleys in Blocks 34 and 39, of Loch Gilvra Addition, being the alleys between 41st Avenue North and 42nd Avenue North, from East Newton Street to McGilvra Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 61108, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
